products.title: Harper Linen Curtain
products.description: Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern. Product id: db-cur1070 fabric colour: linen material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes harper linen curtain in cream. Made to measure from 32.
